column5: Hello I have been a member for quite a while and thought I should finally get around to introducing myself! My name is  Pat and I live in Hamilton. I have always been into fishing but found that I would go a few years not getting out there so last year my wife and I purchased a small boat and I referbished an older Roadtrek camper van. We have spent most of our vaction weeks fishing since then and found the postings on this site a real help!! Looking forward to adding to the discussions when I can! Thanks!
Welcome to the family .This is the greatest site you will ever visit lots of helpful folks and crazy Rednecks too  . Looking forward to your reports.MTP
Welcome to the best fishing board on the net Pat!  Nice intro...looking foward to your first report...remember...we all like pics here
welcome Pat sit, relax, enjoy and stay awhile

From one Hamiltonian to another, hello Pat.  And when you and your wife don't feel like loading everything up and traveling for a fishing trip, you can always put in at Pier 4 park for some bass, eh?  Welcome.
Welcome,  The more put in the more you get back in exchange
